iti28:2.1: “Dvihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme dukkham viharati savighatam saupayasam saparilaham;
iti28:2.2: kayassa bheda param marana duggati patikankha.
iti28:2.4: Indriyesu aguttadvarataya ca, bhojane amattannutaya ca.
iti28:2.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu dittheva dhamme dukkham viharati savighatam saupayasam saparilaham;
iti28:2.6: kayassa bheda param marana duggati patikankha”ti.
iti28:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
